abstract: Qatar pulls major upset at Men’s Handball World Championship with a win over Slovenia, 31-29.
lead_paragraph: The Cuban-born Rafael Capote scored 12 goals to help host Qatar pull off a major upset at the Men’s Handball World Championship and beat Slovenia.
snippet: The Cuban-born Rafael Capote scored 12 goals to help host Qatar pull off a major upset at the Men’s Handball World Championship and beat Slovenia.

headline.main: Host Qatar Pulls Off a Surprise at Handball Championship
headline.print_headline: Host Qatar Pulls Off a Surprise
